root: ^Police: Wouldn't you rather go somewhere else Mrs. Maloney? Perhaps your sister's house or even my own. We can put you up for the night.

s: ^No. I would like to stay right where I am. I don't think I could move even a yard at the moment. You wouldn't mind if I stayed here a while would you? I dont feel good at the moment.
^I'll take you up on that offer then. Where was your house again?

c-0: ^Police: Not even to the bed madam?
